select
from REGISTRATION.LPHS left join REGISTRATION.HOUSEANDHOUSE on LPHS.LPHS_LSH = HOUSEANDHOUSE.LPCSHS_LSH where LPHS.LPZ_LSH = #{lpzLsh,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and LPHS.ISFSW=1
select count(*) from registration.lphs t where t.lpz_lsh = #{0} and t.fwyt='住宅' and t.isfsw <> 1
